RSS News:
Author: Divoom

Clock Info: Display RSS new title for major events on the selected fileds. In clock configuration, please selected your interested topics and apply. The clock will rotate and display the title of the major eveents.

Source: https://rss.nytimes.com. The clock has taken resource from this link, which can be accessed publicly on the Internet. All copyrights and title belongs to the original source and authors. Not intended for business use.
Contact:
Function & suggestion: developer@divoom.com
Customer support: support@divoom.com

Please enter the channel ID (not the channel name). The channel ID can be found on the browser URL. For example:
Divoom's YouTube channel's URL is: https://www.youtube.com/c/Divoominternational, and the channel ID is: Divoominternational (not its channel name Divoom).
*The channel ID is always available on the URL, and it may not be the same as the channel name.

YouTube Video
A YouTube Video ID is a unique ID to identify a video which is uploaded to YouTube.
Example: https://youtu.be/30KqRUvegu4 where "30KqRUvegu4" is the YouTube video ID

Dial - Dial Description:
Dial Inspiration: Divoom Team
Description: You can use animations from the DIVOOM community as clock digits to design your own clock dial.
Function Introduction: Users need to set animations from 0 to 9 and ':', and after configuring them, the dial will use these animations to display time.
Device Feedback: support@divoom.com
Function Development Suggestions: developer@divoom.com

Display multiple clocks in your defined rotation order.

Please make sure the device firmware version is 90144 or higher

Dial - Dial Description:
Dial Inspiration: Divoom Team
Description: Different styles of numbers can be selected to display time information.
Function Introduction: Choose the relevant font in the configuration to change the style.
Device Feedback: support@divoom.com
Function Development Suggestions: developer@divoom.com

Dial - Dial Description:
Dial Inspiration: Divoom Team
Description: Choose multiple animations from the DIVOOM community, and five screens can synchronize playback of related animations.
Function Introduction: There are a total of four sets of switches, and each screen can be configured with four consecutive animations.
Device Feedback: support@divoom.com
Function Development Suggestions: developer@divoom.com
You can freely choose five different sets of city times and add corresponding city background pictures

Imagine sitting at your desk with a quaint time lamp composed of five small square screens, softly flickering away. It's not just a guardian of time, but also a miniature palette for your moods. Each screen can switch fonts according to your feelings or spur-of-the-moment inspirations, like dressing time in different outfits. In the mood for nostalgia? Try a typewriter font. Feeling breezy? A stylish handwritten font might be the way to go.

The colors too are at your command. Feeling exuberant today? Bright yellow is your hue. In need of some tranquility? A soft blue can calm your senses. Even the background images are yours to choose, from photos of your travels to scenes from your favorite films, showcasing your personality.

This time lamp is like a cozy corner that allows your creativity and memories to shine through every tiny moment. Perched under your computer, it's your companion through work; placed on the table, it's both a decoration and a fountain of inspiration. Life is more than the hustle before your eyes—it's also about this lamp on your desk, and the dancing words within it.
